item.description: I like to bring Spark here every once in a while for some shopping, socialization, and... I'll be honest... showing off! Bass Pro Shops welcomes dogs of all breeds (provided they aren't aggressive, of course) and even give you a treat and a poop bag when you walk in! This would be just a casual, fun thing to do with the kids... Public thing to raise a little awareness and have some fun when it starts to get chilly!... Obviously, up to you all individually, but I ALWAYS buy at least a little something when I bring Spark here so they don't feel like we're intruding... Remember guys, just like all our events, NO flexi/extendable leashes and remember you are representing the NEBBC and our breeds. This is a public place: everyone needs to control their animals. Check out any of our tons of training events if you need help in this area or contact our in-house trainers, Cassie, president, at justcassie101@gmail.com, Barbara Jean Crehan, director of public relations at bjcrehan88@hotmail.com, or vice president Lorena Lacasse at newenglandbullybreedclub.com. Hope to see you there!! P.S. There are some pictures of our last trip on www.facebook.com/NEBBC!
item.name: Bring the Dogs for an Outing to Bass Pro Shops in Foxboro!
